Well worth the download..

Just remember when watching this.. The men featured in the movie, are only doing what they have been told.. They are not bad people, only weak people, who are followers.. Every herd needs a shephard..

Thanks sheila6. good quality, good flik.

@dukeofhazard- the nuremberg defense will never hold water. Torturers and murderers have no excuse, 'just following orders, making a living, young and stupid, it works, they deserved it, protecting my community, nation blah blah', etc. all lies, from people neither weak nor strong, just psychopaths let loose, profiting from pain.
